task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 14°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to look up to see the full height of the building from ground to roof, as the current pitch is 0° and only shows the middle section.
I am looking up at the building but cannot see the full height from base to roof; I need to tilt down slightly to locate the ground level for accurate height estimation.
I can now see the base of the building at 15° down and have previously seen the top at 30° up; with this angular span and known distance, I can estimate the height as approximately 24 meters.
